certifications.title: CCNAv7: Enterprise Networking, Security, and Automation

projects.name: Walkie-Talkie
projects.description: Designed and implemented a real-time chat app using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) with Socket.io for instant messaging, fostering seamless communication among users. Engineered a scalable back-end infrastructure with Node.js and Express, incorporating RESTful APIs for user authentication, message storage/retrieval, and Socket.io for real-time bidirectional communication, resulting in a 20% increase in message throughput. Implemented secure user authentication using JWT tokens and bcrypt encryption, ensuring data privacy, and employed Redux Toolkit for efficient state management, leading to a 10% reduction in authentication-related errors.

projects.name: WeatherNow+
projects.description: Developed a weather application using Next.js and Weatherbit API, fetching real-time data and enhancing user experience. Leveraged the Weatherbit API to procure real-time weather data, resulting in a 10% improvement in forecast accuracy. Utilized Chart.js for chart generation, enabling users to visualize historical weather data, contributing to a 10% increase in user engagement.

projects.name: Lyrics Genie
projects.description: Crafted a web application using React, Node.js, and Express.js, integrating the Genius API to fetch song information based on user input. Employed Node.js and Express.js to manage API requests and integrate with the Genius API for server-side data retrieval, resulting in a 30% reduction in response time. Integrated Genius API for user search functionality, retrieving song details, lyrics, and artist information based on title, artist, or lyrics, enhancing user satisfaction and engagement.

experiences.description: Engineered and deployed NoteSheet Management WebApp using ReactJS, Express.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, optimizing note-taking processes for over 300 faculty members. Achieved a 30% decrease in post-deployment errors and reduced server response times by 30% through implementing performance optimization techniques. Collaborated with a cross-functional team of 5 developers, delivering the project within a 4-month time frame utilizing agile methodologies.

experiences.company_name: What The Hack - Web3 based Hackathon
experiences.description: Led the front-end development of a web3 app with React.js, enhancing user experience. Enhanced frontend-Tezos blockchain integration, boosting transaction speed by 20% and reducing fees by 15%. Secured 4th position out of 120 teams.
